Contact Details: Responsible Analysts: Homelessness statistics Statistical enquiries: (Office hours) 0303 444 2867  Homelessnessstats@communities.gov.uk
Description: These tables include information on new prevention and relief duties owed. They are not comparable with the homelessness decisions figures reported prior to April 2018. This is because amendments to legislation, as introduced by the 2017 HRA, have introduced new duties that mean more people will be eligible for assistance out of homelessness from local authorities.
Name: Statutory homelessness in England
Notes: This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. please email alternativeformats@communities.gov.uk. Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use.
Producer: Ministry for Housing, Communities and Local Government (MHCLG)
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located on the landing page by scrolling down the page to 'Statutory homelessness in England' and clicking on the statutory homelessness live tables XLS spreadsheet however other formats may be available please see notes for details of how to request.
Sizing Notes: Although this initially appears to be complex a machine readable format may be available, however some work may be required to determine what the dimensions should be named.
